src_original: rājā kathayati:  śobhanam evaṃ bhavatv iti  Anāthapiṇḍada meets the Buddha  tato 'nāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatiḥ prabhūtaṃ kulaśulkam ādāya rājagṛhaṃ gataḥ;  sa yasya gṛhapater gṛhe vāsam upagataḥ sa gṛhapatiḥ sarātram evotthāyāntarjanam āmaṃtrayate:
tgt_original: 是居士請佛及僧明日食，故後夜起，喚兒息、奴婢、內外作人：

src_original: uttiṣṭhāryā uttiṣṭha;  bhadramukhāḥ kāṣṭhāni pāṭayata samitiṃ prajvālayata;  bhaktaṃ pacata;
tgt_original: 「汝等速起，破薪、取水、安施釜鑊、煮飯作羹。

src_original: sūpikaṃ pacata;  khādyakāny ullāḍayata;  pratijāgṛta maṇḍalavāṭam iti;
tgt_original: 」是居士自莊嚴堂舍敷眾坐處。

src_original: athānāthapiṇḍasya gṛhapater etad abhavat:
tgt_original: 時給孤獨作是念：

src_original: kiṃ punar asya gṛhapater āvāho vā vivāho vā bhaviṣyati;  rāṣṭraṃ vānena bhaktenopanimantritam?
tgt_original: 「是居士為欲嫁娶？ 為請國王及大臣耶？

src_original: iti viditvā taṃ gṛhapatim idam avocat:
tgt_original: 」作是念已，問居士言：

src_original: kiṃ punas te gṛhapate āvāho vā bhaviṣyati,  vivāho vā rāṣṭraṃ vā tvayā bhaktenopanimantritaṃ śreṇī vā pūgo vā parṣado vā rājā vā te māgadhaḥ śreṇyo bimbisāro bhaktenopanimantrita iti;
tgt_original: 「汝欲嫁娶、為欲請國王大臣、為作大施會耶？

src_original: sa kathayati:
tgt_original: 」居士答言：

src_original: gṛhapate na me āvāho bhaviṣyati na vivāho vā nāpi mayā rāṣṭraṃ bhaktenopanimantritaṃ,  na śreṇī na pūgo na parṣado nāpi rājā māgadhaḥ śreṇyo bimbisāro bhaktenopanimantritaḥ api tu buddhapramukho bhikṣusaṃgho bhaktenopanimantrita;
tgt_original: 「我不嫁娶亦不請王及大臣也。 請佛及僧明日食，故作大施會。

src_original: iti anāthapaiṇḍadasya gṛhapater buddha ity aśrutapūrvaṃ ghoṣaṃ śrutvā sarvaromakūpāny (A 318b)  āhṛṣṭāni; sa āhṛṣṭaromakūpas taṃ gṛhapatim idam avocat:
tgt_original: 」給孤獨氏初聞佛名，心喜毛竪，問言：

src_original: ka eṣa gṛhapate buddho nāma?
tgt_original: 「何人是佛？ 」居士答言：

src_original: asti gṛhapate śramaṇo (Śay-v 15)  gautamaḥ śākyaputraḥ (MSV III 139)  śākyakulāt keśaśmaśrū avatārya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇy ācchādya samyag eva śraddhayā agārād anagārikāṃ pravrajitaḥ;
tgt_original: 「有釋王太子，以信出家得無上道，故號為佛。

src_original: ka eṣa gṛhapate saṅgho nāma?
tgt_original: 「何名為僧？

src_original: brāhmaṇakulād api vaiśyakulād api śūdrakulād api kulaputrāḥ keāśaśmaśrū avatārya  kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇi ācchādya samyag eva śraddhayā anāgārād anāgārikāṃ tam eva bhagavantaṃ  pravrajitam anupravrajitāḥ;  sa eṣa gṛhapate saṅgho nāma;  ḥśvaḥḥ sa mayā buddhapramukho bhikṣusaṅgho 'ntargṛhe bhaktenopanimantritaḥ;
tgt_original: 「有種種人、種種雜姓、種種異人出家，剃除鬚髮服法衣隨佛出家，是名為僧。

src_original: kutra gṛhapate sa bhagavān etarhi viharati?
tgt_original: 」又問： 「佛今所在？

src_original: sthānam etad vidyate yad ihāgataṃ śvo drakṣyasi;
tgt_original: 「近在寒林，欲見隨意。

src_original: anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatis tāṃ rātriṃ buddhālambanayā smṛtyā middham avakrāntaḥ;  so 'prabhāte prabhātasaṃjñī yena śivakadvāraṃ tenopsaṅkrāntaḥ;
tgt_original: 」給孤獨氏至心欲見，夜現明相，即從舍出至大勢神門，門自然開。

src_original: tena khalu samayena śivakadvāraṃ rātryā dvau yāmau vivṛtaṃ tiṣṭhati;  pūrvakaṃ paścimakaṃ ca,
tgt_original: 此門常法，初夜吹唄，為客入故。

src_original: māhaiva āgantukānāṃ gamikānāṃ ca dūtānāṃ vighno bhaviṣyatīti;  yāvat paśyati śivakadvāraṃ vivṛtam ālokena ca sphuṭam;  tasyaitad adhavat:
tgt_original: 後夜吹唄，為人出故。

src_original: nūnaṃ prabhātā rajanī:  tathā hi śivakadvāraṃ vivṛtaṃ tiṣṭhati;  iti viditvā tenaiva ālokena nagarān niṣkrāntaḥ;  samanantaraniṣkrāntasya cāsya ya ālokaḥ (MSV III 140)  so 'ntarhitaḥ;
tgt_original: 爾時給孤獨氏見此門開，念必夜了，出門不遠明相不現，闇無所覩。

src_original: tasyābhūd bhayam;  abhūc chambhitatvaṃ;  abhūd romaharṣah;
tgt_original: 即時驚怖毛竪：

src_original: māhaiva kaścid viheṭayen manuṣyo vāmanuṣyo vā dhūrtako vā asaṃprāptam vā syāt prabhūtaṃ kulaśulkam iti;
tgt_original: 「將無非人嬈固我耶？

src_original: viditvā pratinivartitukāmo madhuskandhasya devaputrasya sthaṇḍilaṃ pradakṣiṇīkaroti,  namaskaroti ca;  atha madhuskandhasya devaputrasya etad abhavat:  adyaivānāthapiṇḍadena gṛhapatinā satyadarśanaṃ kartavyam;  adyaivāyaṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantam apāsya anyadevatānamaskāraṃ kariṣyati;
tgt_original: 」尋欲退還。

src_original: iti viditvā yāvacca śivakadvāraṃ yavac ca śītavanaṃ śmaśānam atrāntarād udāreṇāvabhāsenāvabhāsya anāthapiṇḍadaṃ gṛhapatim idam avocat:
tgt_original: 時大勢門神，為現光明徹照寒林，語言：

src_original: abhikrama gṛhapate,  mā pratikrama;  abhikramatas te śreyo bhaviṣyati;  na pratikramataḥ;
tgt_original: 「汝去！ 勿復恐懼，我前世時是汝善知識密肩婆羅門，同心相敬居士。

src_original: śatam aśvā śataṃ niṣkāḥ śatam aśvatarīrathāḥ /  nānāvittasya saṃpūrṇāḥ śataṃ ca vaḍavārathāḥ /
tgt_original: 」是時天神即說偈言： 「若人得百馬，　　百瓔珞嚴具；

src_original: padāvihārasyaikasya kalāṃ nārhanti ṣoḍaśīm //  abhikrāma gṛhapate,  mā pratikrāma;  abhikramatas te śreyo bhavati,  na pratikramataḥ;
tgt_original: 草馬車一百，　　不如前一步。

src_original: tat kasya hetoḥ?  śataṃ haimavatā nāgāḥ suvarṇamaṇikalpitāḥ /  īṣādantā mahākāyā vyūḍhavanto mataṅgajāḥ /
tgt_original: 若百雪山象，　　修廣大身牙； 又以純金飾，　　嚴身最殊異；

src_original: padāvihārasyaikasya kalāṃ nārhanti ṣoḍaśīm //  abhikrāma gṛhapate,  mā pratikrama;  abhikramatas (MSV III 141)  te śreyo bhavati;  na pratikramataḥ;
tgt_original: 不如前一步，　　十六分之一。

src_original: śataṃ kāmbojikā kanyāḥ āmuktamaṇikuṇḍalāḥ /  suvarṇakeyūradharāḥ niṣkagrīvāḥ svalaṅkṛtāḥ /
tgt_original: 北方百美女，　　瓔珞環金印； 以是莊嚴具，　　年少端正妙；

src_original: padāvihārasyaikasya kalāṃ nārhanti ṣoḍaśīm //
tgt_original: 比汝前一步，　　十六不及一。

src_original: upaśāntaḥ sukhaṃ śete śāntiprāptena cetasā //
tgt_original: 得寂滅處故，　　我臥常安隱。

src_original: atha bhagavān anāthapiṇḍadaṃ gṛhapatim ādāya vihāraṃ praviśya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ;  anāthapiṇḍado gṛhpatir bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ;  ekānte niṣaṇṇam anāthapiṇḍadaṃ gṛhapatiṃ bhagavān dharmyayā kathayā sandarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati,  yāsau buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ pūrvakālakaraṇīyā dharmyā kathā,  tadyathā dānakathā śīlakathā svargakathā kāmānām āsvādādīnavasaṃkleśavyavadānanaiṣkramyapraviveka anuśaṃsavyavadānapakṣyān dharmān vistareṇa
tgt_original: 」爾時世尊即於經行處坐，是居士頭面禮佛足却坐一面，佛為說法示教利喜，為說初法布施持戒生天果報，說五欲過世間苦惱，出家安樂分別垢淨。

src_original: yadā cainaṃ bhagavān adrākṣīt hṛṣṭacittaṃ kalyacittaṃ muditacittaṃ vinivaraṇacittaṃ bhavyaṃ pratibalaṃ sāmutkarṣikīṃ dharmadeśanām ājñātum,  tadā yāsau buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ sāmutkarṣikī dharmadeśanā tadyathā duḥkhaṃ samudayo nirodho mārgaś catvāry āryasatyāni vistareṇa saṃprakāśayati;  athānāthapiṇḍado gḥapatis tasminn evāsane niṣaṇṇaś catvaṛy āryasatyāny abhisameti;  tadyathā duḥkhaṃ samudayo nirodho mārgaḥ;  tasyathā śuddhaṃ vastram apagatakālakaṃ rañjanopagaṃ raṅge prakṣiptaṃ samyag eva raṅgaṃ pratigṛhṇāti,
tgt_original: 佛知是人心調柔軟堪受上法，為說四諦苦習盡道，如白淨衣易受染色，是人亦爾，聞法開悟，即於座上見法得法，知法通達法，斷疑不隨他，於佛法中得無所畏。

src_original: eso 'haṃ bhagavantaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchāmi;  dharmaṃ ca bhikṣusaṅghaṃ ca;  upāsakam māṃ ca dhāraya adyāgreṇa yāvajjīvaṃ prāṇopetaṃ śaraṇāgatam abhiprasannam;
tgt_original: 我心樂佛法，知我盡壽作優婆塞，願世尊及僧，受我夏請住舍衛國。

src_original: atha bhagavān anāthapiṇḍadaṃ gṛhapatim idam āvocat:
tgt_original: 」佛知故問居士：

src_original: kinnāmā tvaṃ gṛhapate?
tgt_original: 「汝字何等？ 」答言：

src_original: aham asmi bhadanta sudatto nāmnā;  api tv anāthebhyaḥ piṇḍakam anuprayacchāmi;  tato mām anāthapiṇṣado gṛhapatir anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatir iti janaḥ sañjānīte;  kutobhūmakas tvaṃ gṛhapate? (Śay-v 18)
tgt_original: 「我字須達，供給孤獨故，國人稱我為給孤獨氏。

src_original: santi gṛhapate vihārāḥ śrāvastyām?
tgt_original: 「舍衛國有僧坊不？
